seo.title: Interactive WCAG/RGAA Quiz with Gemini and Jina
seo.description: Test your knowledge of web accessibility guidelines (WCAG/RGAA) with this dynamic quiz. This project uses Vue.js 3, Google's Gemini API for question generation, and Jina Reader for content analysis.

common.language_changed_announcement: The page is now in English

results.title: Results
results.finalScore: Your final score is {score} out of {total}.

feedback.perfect: Excellent! You are a quiz master!
feedback.average: Not bad! A little more practice and it will be perfect.

messages.fetchError: Could not load questions. Please check your connection or try again later.
messages.noAnswer: Please select an answer before continuing.
